Package ca.team4308.absolutelib.wrapper

Interface EncoderWrapper

All Known Implementing Classes:
EncoderWrapper.CANCoderImpl, EncoderWrapper.DioEncoderImpl, EncoderWrapper.DutyCycleEncoderImpl, EncoderWrapper.GenericAbsoluteRotationsImpl, EncoderWrapper.GenericCountsImpl, EncoderWrapper.GenericMechanismRotationsImpl, EncoderWrapper.TalonFXIntegratedImpl
public interface EncoderWrapper
EncoderWrapper provides a minimal, vendor-agnostic interface for fetching and setting position. Supports both linear (meters) and rotational (rotations/radians) units.

  • Method Details

    • getPositionMeters

      double getPositionMeters()
      Current linear position in meters. Requires drumDiameter to be configured.

    • setPositionMeters

      void setPositionMeters(double meters)
      Reset/report the linear position in meters.

    • getPositionMechanismRotations

      double getPositionMechanismRotations()
      Current position in mechanism rotations.

    • setPositionMechanismRotations

      void setPositionMechanismRotations(double rotations)
      Reset/report position in mechanism rotations.

    • setSimulatedPositionMechanismRotations

      default void setSimulatedPositionMechanismRotations(double rotations)
      Update the simulated sensor state (if applicable). Used to feed simulation physics back into the sensor so control loops work in sim.

    • getPositionRadians

      default double getPositionRadians()
      Current position in radians.

    • setPositionRadians

      default void setPositionRadians(double rads)
      Reset/report position in radians.

    • isAbsolute

      default boolean isAbsolute()
      Returns true if this encoder is absolute (position persists across power cycles).
